1.0.name: wordpress/socials-ignited
1.0.description:
Brought to you by the folks of CSSIgniter, the Socials Ignited plugin allows you to display and link icons on your website of more than 50 social networks, just by dragging a widget.

All you have to do is set your URL for each social network you are registered, and then just drag the widget into any widget area you want.

There are icons for:

  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Digg
  • Flickr
  • And much, much more...

Of course, there are more features to come. Check the To Do section for what is coming.
